No. 274894)} Sub: Payment of Gratuity and Leave Encashment to the Employees of NHAI -reg: In supersession of Policy Circular No. NHAl/11041/217/2007-Admn. dated 15.09.2011 and in continuation of Policy Circular No.1.3.1.34/2024 dated 21.06.2024 (Annexure-I) with regard to increasing the maximum limit of Retirement Gratuity and Death Gratuity from Rs.20 lakh to Rs.25 lakh with effect from 01.01.2024 in respect of Officers & Employees of NHAI by adopting the D/o Pension & Pensioner's Welfare OM No.28/03/2024- PaPW(B)/Gratuity/9559 dated 30.05.2024, it is clarified that the Payment of Gratuity in case of Officers and Employees of NHAI shall be made as per the instructions applicable to the Employees of the Central Government Employees [i.e: the Central Civil Services (Pension) Rules, 1972 (as amended from time to time) or the Central Civil Services (Implementation of National Pension System) Rules, 2021 or the Central Civil Services Payment of Gratuity under National Pension System) Rules, 2021 (as amended from time to time) {as the case may be} only for the purpose of Gratuity] and calculation shall be made accordingly: 2 It is also clarified that the Leave Encashment and Calculation thereof shall continue to be Governed by the NHAI (Leave) Regulations, 1997 (as amended from time to time) and instructions issued by NHAI from time to time. 3_ The Competent Authority to approve release of Gratuity and Leave Encashment of the Employee shall continue to be CGM (HR/Admn:), subject to the condition that calculation made by HR/Admn: Division under these heads are vetted by the Finance Division of NHAI HQ 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl: As stated above (CS.
